date: Sun Feb 13 2022 11:36:58 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
description: Rapper Kodak Black was among four people shot outside a club in West Hollywood, California. The 24-year-old Florida rapper, whose legal name is Bill Kapri, and three other people were shot. It was not immediately clear who fired the shots or what sparked the incident outside the club. The suspected shooter, described only as a black male, fled south.
metaDescription: See an AI generated picture of Kodak Black who was among four people shot outside a club in West Hollywood at an after party hosted by Justin Bieber
